objects.src: <svg width='1080' height='1080' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='#FFF5F7'/><defs><linearGradient id='peachGradient' x1='0' y1='0' x2='1' y2='1'><stop offset='0%' stop-color='#FFD1D9'/><stop offset='100%' stop-color='#FFB6C1'/></linearGradient><linearGradient id='lightPink' x1='0' y1='0' x2='1' y2='1'><stop offset='0%' stop-color='#FFEEF2'/><stop offset='100%' stop-color='#FFE0E6'/></linearGradient><linearGradient id='darkPink' x1='0' y1='0' x2='1' y2='1'><stop offset='0%' stop-color='#FFA3B5'/><stop offset='100%' stop-color='#FF8DA1'/></linearGradient></defs><path d='M0 0 L1080 0 L1080 1080 L0 1080 L0 0' fill='url(#peachGradient)' stroke='#ffffff' stroke-width='1'/><path d='M0 0 C400 0, 800 300, 1080 250 L1080 1080 L0 1080 L0 0' fill='url(#lightPink)' stroke='#ffffff' stroke-width='1' opacity='0.7'/><path d='M0 400 C300 350, 700 600, 1080 550 L1080 1080 L0 1080 L0 400' fill='url(#darkPink)' stroke='#ffffff' stroke-width='1' opacity='0.3'/><circle cx='540' cy='580' r='300' fill='none' stroke='#FFB6C1' stroke-width='5'/><circle cx='540' cy='580' r='290' fill='#FFFFFF' opacity='0.9'/><circle cx='880' cy='450' r='140' fill='#FFB6C1' stroke='#FFFFFF' stroke-width='2'/><g opacity='0.3'><circle cx='200' cy='300' r='20' fill='#FFB6C1'/><circle cx='900' cy='200' r='15' fill='#FFB6C1'/><circle cx='150' cy='700' r='25' fill='#FFB6C1'/><circle cx='850' cy='750' r='18' fill='#FFB6C1'/><circle cx='700' cy='900' r='22' fill='#FFB6C1'/></g><g opacity='0.2'><path d='M200 200 Q250 150, 300 200 Q350 250, 400 200' stroke='#FF8DA1' fill='none' stroke-width='3'/><path d='M700 200 Q750 150, 800 200 Q850 250, 900 200' stroke='#FF8DA1' fill='none' stroke-width='3'/><path d='M100 800 Q150 750, 200 800 Q250 850, 300 800' stroke='#FF8DA1' fill='none' stroke-width='3'/></g></svg>

objects.text: • MULTI POCKETS • DURABLE CANVAS • ADJUSTABLE STRAP

product_details.description: 💗【Original Designed Brand】Original designed brand,exquisite production technology,thickened canvas material,large capacity multi-pocket practical.Strong structure can hold over 40 pounds,can stand by itself own.Reject cheap and low-quality malicious imitation. 💗【Mutil Pockets】The canvas tote bag with 2 front pockets can put cellphone,Watter bottle,keys,and wallet convenient access at any time,1 big pockets behind the bag can put ipad to pass the time when bored. 💗【Structured Bag】The purse can upright on by itself own,easy to place on the desktop or floor at any time and keep the contents of the bag from spilling.Use thick quality canvas, strong and rugged. 💗【Large Capacity】Square design,high space utilization,suitable for books and documents,in addition to everyday use,it is also suitable for work and college.can used as laptop computer teacher work nurse travel beach gym gift book bag. 💗【Removable and Adjustable Shoulder Strap】The crossbody messenger bag with removable and adjustable shoulder strap,handbag tote bag also crossbody bag. 💗【Magnetic Closure】The women purses and handbags designed with magnetic closure,easy to take things from inside the bag and put things,but also can help to protect privacy and prevent theft. Fabric type - Canvas ** Care instructions - Machine Wash ** Origin - Imported ** Country of Origin - China **

banner_details:
This vibrant promotional banner features a soft and stylish aesthetic, ideal for showcasing fashion accessories. The background consists of layered pink gradients with abstract wave shapes, circles, and curved lines, creating a visually dynamic yet gentle backdrop. The central focus is on a product image, framed inside a soft pink circle. A bold text layer with the id `heading` introduces the product, followed by a complementary subheading (`subheading`) highlighting its key appeal. A circular price badge (`price`) sits to the right, drawing attention. Supporting features are listed under the `description` text, while a rectangular button (`cta_button`) with corresponding label (`cta`) prompts user action.

**Color Palette:**
- Soft Peach: `#FFD1D9`
- Light Pink: `#FFEEF2`
- Bold Pink: `#D81B60`
- Deep Rose: `#AD1457`
- Dark Mauve: `#880E4F`
- Accent Pink: `#FFB6C1`
- CTA Button Pink: `#C2185B`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image features a canvas bag in a soft, pastel pink color, delivering a clean, elegant, and feminine aesthetic. The primary color is a muted blush pink (#F4AEBB), consistent throughout the body, straps, and pockets of the bag. Minimal contrast is introduced via the silver metal hardware (#A9A9A9), adding a subtle accent. The pink shade is monochromatic, creating a harmonious and soothing effect that enhances its appeal. This unified color scheme makes the bag visually calming, which can be echoed in an advertisement banner using complementary colors like soft white (#FFFFFF), blush beige (#FBEAE7), and rose gold (#B76E79) for text and highlights.
